attributes.action: Increase the speed limited to 100 on the motorway
attributes.additional_details: Increase the speed limited to 100 mph on the 3rd lane of the motorway when traffic is light. Car are faster and much safer . Also a lot of people drive over the 70mph speed limited and risk getting point which in turn mean increase in insurance price and possible ban . As Germany as  a nation can have unlimited on they motorway why can't we least have 100mph on the 3rd when traffic is light.
